definitions.definition: A performer's first performance to the public, in sport, the arts or some other area.
The first public presentation of a theatrical play, motion picture, opera, musical composition, dance, or other performing arts piece.
definitions.example: Since making its debut two years ago, the program has gained cult status.

definitions.definition: The first appearance of a debutante in society.
To formally introduce, as to the public
definitions.example: Amalgamated Software Systems debuted release 3.2 in Spring of 2004.

definitions.definition: To make one's initial formal appearance
definitions.example: Release 3.2 debuted to mixed reviews in Spring of 2004.
